title: Pixel 3 is continuously blinking , though I bought it just two months ago
content:
I bought a new phone two months ago, suddenly it's continuously blinking.tried below troubleshooting:
#send feedback about the device
# tried to use in safe mode
# tried factory reset
# and lastly from system update installed Android 10
And still that blinking continue
What should I do now? As I didn't get any reply to my feedback.
